attributes.action: ask the Attorney General Baroness Scotland to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The orderly functioning of our society requires compliance with the law, which in turn requires trust in the law and a sense of moral obligation to obey the law.  Both of these principles have been undermined by the failure of the Attorney-General to resign following her breach of the law whilst in office, and the consequential breach of three of the Principles of Public Life – integrity, accountability and leadership.  The Prime Minister must request the resignation of Baroness Scotland in order to maintain the integrity of the office of Attorney-General and to maintain public trust in the law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
